Package com.mapgroup.classificator.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServerExecutor
    According to the "Command" design pattern, this interface represents the way in order to execute a specific operation to satisfy a specific request.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttrInfoSenderExecutor
    This class grants the possibility to send to the client the information about the attributes' values needed for the prediction session.
    AvailableDatExecutor
    This class grants to obtain the list of all the serialized tree that the server has generated.
    ConnectionCloserExecutor
    This class provides a way in order to ask to the server to close the connection
    ContextRequest
    This class models the structure of the information about the current context.
    ConvertExecutor
    This class models the executor used to convert a specific saved dataset in a specified format available.
    DatabaseExecutor
    This class grants the possibility to load from a database table the dataset that will be used in order to start the decision tree's learning process.
    LoadTreeExecutor
    This class provide functionality in order to deserialize and load a specific decision tree that is previously saved on a file.
    PredictionExecutor
    This class grants to predict a specific class value starting from specific requests made by the user.
    SendMailExecutor
    This class grants to the client to send a mail report of the current prediction session to multiple email addressees and attach to this report also a pdf document which contains the result of all the user's operation that he has done during the prediction session.
    ServerExecutorFactory
    According to the Factory design pattern, this class models an instrument in order to instantiate the specific executor class for the specific context in which we are.
    SupportedExtExecutor
    This class grants the possibility to get the list of all supported file extension that can be used in order to save the loaded dataset.
    TreeSerializerExecutor
    This class grant the possibility to store in specific file the generated decision tree.
    UploadExecutor
    This class provide a way in order to manage the file uploading done by the client.
    ValidateMailExecutor
    This class provide a way in order to check the correctness of a specific mail address according to the internet address format.
